    • Constructor Detail

      • PlanetMap

        public PlanetMap()
        The map for one of the planets in the Battlecode world. This information defines the terrain, dimensions, and initial units of the planet.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public PlanetMap clone()
        Deep-copy a PlanetMap.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • getHeight

        public long getHeight()
        Returns the height of this map, in squares. Must be in the range [MAP_HEIGHT_MIN, MAP_HEIGHT_MAX], inclusive.

      • getInitial_units

        public VecUnit getInitial_units()
        Returns the initial units on the map. Each team starts with 1 to 3 Workers on Earth.

      • getPlanet

        public Planet getPlanet()
        Returns the planet of the map.

      • getWidth

        public long getWidth()
        Returns the height of this map, in squares. Must be in the range [MAP_WIDTH_MIN, MAP_WIDTH_MAX], inclusive.

      • initialKarboniteAt

        public long initialKarboniteAt(MapLocation location)
        The amount of Karbonite initially deposited at the given location.
        Throws:
        LocationOffMap - If the location is off the map.

      • isPassableTerrainAt

        public short isPassableTerrainAt(MapLocation location)
        Whether the location on the map contains passable terrain. Is only false when the square contains impassable terrain (distinct from containing a building, for instance).
        Throws:
        LocationOffMap - If the location is off the map.

      • onMap

        public boolean onMap(MapLocation location)
        Whether a location is on the map.

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(long value)

      • setInitial_units

      • setPlanet

        public void setPlanet(Planet value)

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(long value)

      • toJson

        public java.lang.String toJson()
        Serialize a PlanetMap to a JSON string

      • validate

        public void validate()
        Validates the map and checks some invariants are followed.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapObject - If the planet map is invalid.
